channel.title: None on SICL Compiler

item.title: Improved GC
item.description: Improved GC Hayley’s algorithm in initiated by: git clone https://github.com/sbcl/sbcl; cd sbcl;SBCL_MAKE_JOBS="-j" SBCL_MAKE_PARALLEL=42069 ./make.sh –with-mark-region-gc It’s improvement of performance on my machine is pure magic.
